text.0:
:television: Catch researcher @cayleyclifford on @Newzroom405 from 17h15 today as she looks at #SouthAfrica’s youth #unemployment figures & if the country really has the world’s ‘worst levels’ of youth unemployment as claimed by @IOL. 

Read the #factcheck here: https://t.co/rlYfpQOlhz
text.1:
[UPDATE] @StatsSA released its latest employment stats on 12 November. 

The unemployment rate for people aged 15 to 34 increased to 43.2% in Q3. This is according to the narrow definition of unemployment. 

The unemployment rate was 56.3% according to the expanded definition. https://t.co/RIfYYecSpo
text.2: The senate has 109 members while the house of representatives has 360. Altogether, there are 469 federal legislators. https://t.co/alXm0ffdLh
text.3:
Claim: There are 465 federal legislators.

Verdict: Understated https://t.co/alXm0ffdLh
text.4: The government has proposed N128 billion for the national assembly in 2021. This is unchanged from the figure the assembly approved in December 2019. https://t.co/alXm0eXCmH
text.5:
Claim: Nigeria's legislator's budget is N125 billion.

Verdict: Understated https://t.co/alXm0ffdLh
text.6: The 2020 budget initially allocated N686.8 billion to education, before revising this to N473.05 billion. In 2019 the budget was N462 billion, and N541 billion was allocated in 2018.. For 2021, the government has proposed N545.1 billion in funding. https://t.co/alXm0ffdLh
text.7:
Claim: Nigeria's education budget is N48 billion for 200 million people.

Verdict: Incorrect https://t.co/alXm0eXCmH
text.8: Data shows the federal government has budgeted at least N300 billion for health since 2017. https://t.co/alXm0eXCmH
text.9:
Claim: Nigeria's healthcare budget is N46 billion for 200 million people.

Verdict: Incorrect https://t.co/alXm0ffdLh
text.10: :Nigeria: During Nigeria’s recent #EndSARS protests, a graphic comparing the national budget for healthcare and education to the cost of maintaining the national assembly was widely shared on social media. But are the claims in the graphic supported by evidence? https://t.co/alXm0ffdLh
